title: Like Being Able To Fire People
creator: David Kanda

extendedInfo.description: Fianlly, an app to embrace the most awkward gaffe in the GOP primary election. Mitt Romney's undying words of "I like being able to fire people" are now able in mobile form. That's right, anywhere and at any time, one can now be able to press a button a let fly the most carefully constructed oversight of the presidential race thus far. Features*Hours of both laughter and insight provided from one of the GOP's front-running candidates*The most useful app since the flashlight
